name: Fine Arts Trader
description:
This game was made for Brackeys GameJam 2022_1 week 8 
The theme was "It is not real"
We try to show the broken world of fine arts
Money laundering, tax evasion and oligarchy is among other problems that is running rampant in the fine arts industry.
The intention is to show the Player a glimpse behind the facade.

The Team

The Team that have done this game is the following
Gabriel Axelsson - Programming
Adrian Hagerman - Graphics, Sound Design
